title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard, the context for nested classes is not handled correctly.
EB: The new class wizard should correctly handle the context for nested classes.
SR:
1. Open the new class wizard.
2. Select the option to create a nested class.
3. Follow the steps provided to create the nested class.
4. Observe that the context is not set correctly for the nested class.
